summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4964 for the improvement of the alley in block 15, Hall's Addition and same extended to East Madison Street and the alley in block 1, Witt's Addition and same extended to alley in block 15, Hall's Addition, being alleys in the block bounded by 20th Avenue, East Denny Way and East Madison Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same.
